Project.Title: TIG-3: Two-dimensional electrophoresis database for cellular aging research
Project.Description: The cell strain TIG-3, which was established in our institute, shows the finite life span up to 70-80 population doubling levels (PDLs). The preparation of our 2-D gel-based proteome database was intended for promoting proteomic researches on cellular aging. (Toda T, Kaji K, Kimura N. Electrophoresis 19(2), 344-348, 1998)

Sample.title: TIG-3
Sample.note: Normal human diploid fibroblast cell strain

Fractionation.title: Protein extraction for two-dimesional gel electrophoresis
Fractionation.protein: Whole protein extraction using urea/detergent-containing buffer
Fractionation.note: According to the TMIG Standard Procedure of 2-D PAGE in Proteomics (http://www.proteome.jp/2D/2DE_method.html).
